entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,333,943Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 61

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces‚Äîhuman and otherwise‚Äîare already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn‚Äôt. Protection becomes complicated. And the past‚Äîburied, sealed, and forgotten‚Äîrefuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 121,311Chapters: 68/75Kudos: 78

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

Author: DaoOfGay

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,103Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 214

Stiles is a bit lonely, but he finally decides to ditch Scott on the day of his mother's death, when Scott doesn't come with him to the cemetery. The next day he thinks he's going crazy because he sees floating symbols on things and every time he stares at them, he gets a word shoved into his head. He almost freaks out until he writes down the symbol for [Light], and his entire room starts to glow. Then he starts seeing these holes in some places, and suddenly he is somewhere else, and there's various of these breaches everywhere. entry.title: Threshold of the Void
entry.summary:
Author: Infernos

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,688Chapters: 1/20Kudos: 4

Summary: The Druid Council needs Stiles's help. Eight hundred years ago, druids made a catastrophic mistake, creating Tairseach Fol√∫s, a dimensional entity that feeds on supernatural life force. After devastating losses, seventeen druids sacrificed themselves to create a prison outside of our reality where the creature would be contained forever. Seventy-five years ago, a rogue druid discovered records of the prison and relocated it, anchoring it to the ley lines beneath San Francisco, where it began to degrade. The Councils formed a coalition with other supernaturals to reinforce the seals, but in this reality, those seals won't last. Now, a vengeful hunter family has allied with the druid's followers, and they intend to shatter the prison during the autumn equinox. Stiles has eighteen days to stop them and find a way to send Tairseach back where it came from, before it consumes every supernatural being on the West Coast

entry.title: a problem that doesn't want to be solved
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,672Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 68

Summary: Derek is an executive at Hale Publishing. Stiles is his assistant‚Äîhis assistant who's 23 years younger than him. So Derek really shouldn't...notice him. The way that he does.-0-Stiles is attractive. Derek knows that. He‚Äôs not blind. Sometimes, not often, Derek finds himself‚Äîlooking. Admiring. Stiles is tall and fit, broad shoulders that taper to a trim waist, an ass that Derek shouldn‚Äôt be checking out as often as he does, firm and high.Derek isn‚Äôt ignorant to his own fluid sexuality. He used to fuck men, back in the day, when he was twenty and single and easy. But then he was with Jennifer, and since the divorce it‚Äôs just seemed‚Ä¶less complicated. To date women. But he likes men‚Äîaesthetically. Sexually.He likes Stiles more than he should. And it‚Äôs weird not because he‚Äôs a man but because Derek has literally never had this problem before. He‚Äôs never been attracted to one of his assistants, ever. Then again, none of his assistants have been anything like Stiles.

entry.title: When You Call, I Will Come
entry.summary:
Author: auddity

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,960Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 15

Summary: ‚ÄúOkay, are you like, therapizing me or something?‚Äù Derek paused and turned to face him, ‚ÄúNo, I‚Äôm not ‚Äòtherapizing‚Äô you.‚Äù ‚ÄúBecause you asked about me and Lydia, and now you‚Äôre just not answering,‚Äù Stiles explained. ‚ÄúIs that some trick you picked up in therapy?‚Äù Derek smirked, ‚ÄúActually, it is a technique my therapist uses.‚Äù ‚ÄúOh, so this is funny to you!‚Äù Stiles yelled, ‚ÄúMy relationship is just a big joke to you, huh?‚Äù ‚ÄúNo!‚Äù Derek assured him, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not funny, I just think you could really use someone to talk to.‚Äù ‚ÄúAnd that person is you?‚Äù Stiles raised a skeptical brow. ‚ÄúNot necessarily,‚Äù Derek answered. ‚ÄúIdeally, you‚Äôd have your own therapist.‚ÄùAfter the events of the show, Derek visits Stiles in DC. Derek started seeing a therapist and urges Stiles to do the same. Stiles may experience some revelations during Derek's visit, but he is not sold on the whole therapy thing...Rating is M for now, might change in the future.
